nodes.text: Exis Station was a location that, according to the quasi-historical poems known as the Qel-Droma Epics, was situated near the Jedi Order planet of Ossus, located in the Outer Rim Territories' Auril sector. The epics claimed that before Ossus was devastated by the Cron Supernovae, the Jedi managed to save a fraction of the artifacts housed on the planet, which made it to the Jedi Temple on the planet Coruscant via Exis Station.
